item.title: [HTB] Machine: Writer
item.description: Writer Enumeration nmap └─$ nmap -Pn -p- 10.10.11.101 --min-rate 1000 Starting Nmap 7.94 ( https://nmap.org ) at 2023-11-07 07:57 GMT Nmap scan report for 10.10.11.101 (10.10.11.101) Host is up (0.17s latency). Not shown: 65528 closed tcp ports (conn-refused) PORT STATE SERVICE 22/tcp open ssh 80/tcp open http 139/tcp open netbios-ssn 246/tcp filtered dsp3270 445/tcp open microsoft-ds 30624/tcp filtered unknown 45985/tcp filtered unknown Nmap done: 1 IP address (1 host up) scanned in 75.
